Christopher Bernau https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Bernau 0 Christopher Bernau (born Herbert Augustine Bernau, June 2, 1940 – June 14, 1989) was an American actor. Christopher_Bernau ( born Herbert_Augustine_Bernau , June_2_,_1940 – June_14_,_1989 ) was an_American_actor .
